info.author: Sandro Busonera
info.description:
OFX Currency Converter

Description

This tool convert all amounts of an ofx file with a given currency rate exchange.

Executable Tools

Windows:

1. Download the zip file on: https://github.com/sandrobusonera/ofx_currency_converter/raw/master/platform/windows/ofx_currency_converter.zip 2. Unzip it 3. Execute the file, choose first the ofx file to convert, then define the currency exchange rate. 4. A new ofx file would be create based on the original name with the suffix "_updated.ofx"

Report Bugs, suggest improvements or ask questions

Please leave your issues, improvements or questions on this page: https://github.com/sandrobusonera/ofx_currency_converter/issues
info.name: ofx-currency-converter
info.summary: Convert all amounts of a ofx to a currency exchange rate
info.html_description:
<h1>OFX Currency Converter</h1>

<h2>Description</h2> This tool convert all amounts of an ofx file with a given currency rate exchange.

<h2>Executable Tools</h2> <h3>Windows:</h3>

  1. Download the zip file on: https://github.com/sandrobusonera/ofx_currency_converter/raw/master/platform/windows/ofx_currency_converter.zip
  2. Unzip it
  3. Execute the file, choose first the ofx file to convert, then define the currency exchange rate.
  4. A new ofx file would be create based on the original name with the suffix “_updated.ofx”

<h2>Report Bugs, suggest improvements or ask questions</h2> Please leave your issues, improvements or questions on this page: https://github.com/sandrobusonera/ofx_currency_converter/issues
